subject: Rugby (Game)
College Athletics
Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)
lead_paragraph: Brigham Young’s women’s club rugby team will forfeit in the national tournament if it advances to Sunday’s Round of 16, based on the dictates of their Mormon faith.
snippet: Brigham Young’s women’s club rugby team will forfeit in the national tournament if it advances to Sunday’s Round of 16, based on the dictates of their Mormon faith.
